original_text: Of the tribe of Aser were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Nephthalim were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Manasses were sealed twelve thousand.
korean_text: 아셀 지파 중에 일만 이천이요 납달리 지파 중에 일만 이천이요 므낫세 지파 중에 일만 이천이요

sentences.original_text: Of the tribe of Aser were sealed twelve thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 아셀 지파 중에서 만 이천 명이 인침을 받았고

sentences.original_text: Of the tribe of Nephthalim were sealed twelve thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 느브다델 지파 중에서 만 이천 명이 인침을 받았고

sentences.original_text: Of the tribe of Manasses were sealed twelve thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세 지파 중에서 만 이천 명이 인침을 받았더라
